ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,03,02), Spanish_Speaking_Needs__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Payroll_Platform__c, 'PAY'), AND ( NOT(CONTAINS(Text( Service_Location__c ),"Las Vegas Branch 0902")), NOT(CONTAINS(Text( Service_Location__c ),"MPSC")) ), ISCHANGED( StageName ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Spanish Speaking Needs is checked, the Service Location must equal Las Vegas 0902 or one of the MPSC locations. Reference SPANISH ONBOARDING REGIONS on the Documents tab: https://na64.salesforce.com/01570000002z7bY
